EmailTemplate.name: Music Potential Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Last (and arguably the best) Challenge Society event of the Summer!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
The Challenge Society invites you to Music Potential, the final Challenge Society event of the summer!
Join us on 29th August 12 - 7pm for an incredible, one day digital and creative boot camp with workshops delivered by some of the UK's hottest creative industry talent! Get involved with exclusive masterclasses in:
• DJ/MCing • Music Production • Radio • Television and Film • Fashion/Design and Business and Enterprise
Expect to meet and work with rising MC RoxXxan, rapper and actor Ashley Walters, DJ Semtex, MOBO award winning Akala, Fazer (N-Dubz), Jamie Dunn and Pam Cheema, a local fashion entrepreneur with her own line in Topshop Bullring!
Don't miss out! Spaces are limited, text 'YES' and your full name to 07805396756 to reserve your space today!
